title: Disconnecting and Reconnecting from Chat
body:
I don't know if it's from the update, however each time I log into LoL I'll connect to chat and then disconnect. It'll keep doing this and I have no clue how to fix it. I've ran a complete fix of the game, turned on and off firewalls, tested different internet connections as well and nothing seems to be helping. Does anyone have any advice or anything? I'd appreciate it.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: I'm only here just because I just started getting this problem pls help

I don't currently see any issues with chat servers, and everything looks okay when I login as well.  You might have a network setting or connection issue that's preventing comms with the chat server, and I recommend using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help.  Those steps should help restore access!

I've got this problem aswel, updated the client today after work, constantly disconnecting from client, just for it to instantly reconnect.

I can't get connect to any games with my mates, probably because the disconnects happen while i'm in queue aswell, and causes some kind of bug which causes the queue accept window to not appear.
me 2 i have the same problem,i live in Italy,and got good internet connection,till this update nothing went wrong
